original_text: The other disciples came in the boat, dragging the net full of fish, for they were not far from the land, but about a hundred yards off.
korean_text: 다른 제자들은 육지에서 거리가 불과 한 오십 칸쯤 되므로 작은 배를 타고 물고기 든 그물을 끌고 와서

sentences.original_text: The other disciples came in the boat
dragging the net full of fish
sentences.korean_translation: 물고기가 가득 든 그물을 끌고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: for they were not far from the land
but about a hundred yards off
